quote: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
And whoever puts their trust in Allah – He is sufficient for them.
Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
And He found you lost and guided you.
Whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it.
And We have certainly made the Qur’an easy for remembrance.
Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
The strong believer is better and more beloved to Allah than the weak believer.
Allah is more merciful to His servants than a mother is to her child.
Whoever relies upon Allah – He will be enough for him.
Make things easy and do not make them difficult.
None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
Smiling at your brother is a charity.
Every act of kindness is charity.
Whoever follows a path in search of knowledge, Allah will make easy for him a path to Paradise.
He who does not thank people, does not thank Allah.
Your smile for your brother is charity.
This world is just a moment. Live it in obedience.
The dunya is a bridge — cross it, but do not build on it.
He who remembers death often will be given contentment.
What is destined for you will reach you, even if it is beneath two mountains.
Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
He who has no manners has no knowledge.
The heart that is attached to Allah is never broken.
A sin that humbles you is better than a good deed that makes you arrogant.
You were born to worship, not to worry.
When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to make sujood.
